headline.main: Changes Made to Deal Settling NYC Police Surveillance Suits
headline.print_headline: Changes Made to Deal Settling NYC Police Surveillance Suits

lead_paragraph: An agreement that settles lawsuits accusing the New York Police Department of violating basic rights in Muslim communities after Sept. 11, 2001, has been revised to build in more oversight that acts as a check against surveillance abuses.
snippet: An agreement that settles lawsuits accusing the New York Police Department of violating basic rights in Muslim communities after Sept. 11, 2001, has been revised to build in more oversight that acts as a check against surveillance abuses....
